summary: A childless couple struggle in the aftermath of a sexual assault leaves the woman pregnant.
cast: Ambra Angiolini|Raoul Bova|Valeria Solarino|Michele Placido|Manrico Gammarota|Monica Contini|Gennaro Diana|Marcello Catalano|Mejdi El Euchi|Vito Signorile|Tina Tempesta|Vito Lopriore|Enzo Marchetti|Greta Amoruso|Anna Castellaneta|Antonello Marini
title: La scelta
